title: 5 Pieces Silk Skinny Scarf  Headband Solid Color Satin Scarf Neck Wrist Ribbon Scarf
features: Package content: comes with 5 pieces of skinny scarves in 5 different solid colors, red, black, purple, green and dark blue, these solid color and long narrow shape make the scarves graceful and beautiful

Multiple function: these skinny scarfs can be applied for hair band, neckerchief, headbands, scarf bracelet and ankle wrap, you can also use them to wrap around the handle of your bag and other items to make them look prettier
Wide applications: can match with any uniforms, such as office dress, stewardess, hotel and bank attendant, different colors express your different moods and styles

Sweet present: suitable for shopping, dating, party, other outdoor activities and daily wearing, a sweet and considerate present for you sister, mom, girlfriend, friends, daughter, colleagues and so on
Soft material: made of soft satin cloth, has nice breathable property, smooth and soft to touch, can provide you a cosy and comfortable wearing experience, make you look elegant and attractive
